docs.text: Documentation This documentation will outline the features, tutorials and explanations for EcoPlay so you can use it to the best of your ability and to EcoPlay's ability.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: This documentation will outline the features, tutorials and explanations for EcoPlay so you can use it to the best of your ability and to EcoPlay's ability.
docs.title: Documentation

docs.text: Admin Dashboard The admin dashboard is very simple. In this section, I will outline several features and how you can do them. How to add money to an account Via Dashboard Go to admin dashboard Go to Bank accounts Search player Click the options dropdown and click edit. In this edit box you can set the balance. Via Bot $egive <player: mention/ID> <amount> How to add properties to an account Via Dashboard Go to admin dashboard Go to Properties Click the + icon Fill out the information and press Create Property. Note You can put a property on the market via not putting in a property owner. Via Bot Create the property via $ecreate-property <property value> <property name> User will have to $ebuy-property <property name> Note Property names are CaSe SeNsitIvE How to delete/edit properties Note This can only be done via dashboard. Go to admin dashboard Go to properties Find the property Click the dropdown option You can find the settings per property there Tasks Tasks are used to give or take money from a certain role or person every x days. You can create one on both the discord bot or dashboard. Create a task Via Dashboard Go to admin dashboard Go to tasks Click + sign. Via Bot $ecreate-task <target> <amount> <frequency> Delete a task Via Dashboard Go to admin dashboard Go to tasks Press the bin icon
docs.title: How to - dashboard

docs.text: The admin dashboard is very simple. In this section, I will outline several features and how you can do them.

How to add money to an account

docs.text: Go to admin dashboard Go to Bank accounts Search player Click the options dropdown and click edit. In this edit box you can set the balance.
docs.title: Via Dashboard
How to add properties to an account

docs.text: Go to admin dashboard Go to Properties Click the + icon Fill out the information and press Create Property. Note You can put a property on the market via not putting in a property owner.
docs.title: Via Dashboard

docs.text: Create the property via $ecreate-property <property value> <property name> User will have to $ebuy-property <property name> Note Property names are CaSe SeNsitIvE
docs.title: Via Bot

docs.text: Note This can only be done via dashboard. Go to admin dashboard Go to properties Find the property Click the dropdown option You can find the settings per property there

docs.text: User Dashboard The user dashboard is incredibly simple and has all the information on the same page.
